Comments_List: This class helped me to develop the ability to think critically about the role of media and political parties in post-Soviet Russia. I loved the way this class was structured, where each student was able to formulate their own (educated) opinions regarding the current and future state of the Russian government.
Russian media and politics! good understanding of these
I learned a considerable amount about the current affairs politically in Russia. I learned a lot about the influential actors in Russia that arent putin, namely the media and the political parties.
I wish this course was twice a week. I really enjoyed it and would have liked to have been able to attend twice a week instead of just once.
The course was mostly focused around discussing the readings which I didnt love. I also didnt like how unfocused and disorganized the course was. However I did like making chit chat
I would recommend this course to another student.  Professor Semenov was great and the class was very engaging.
Yes, I would because it was a good, low stress class that gave me a good sense of Russian politics today. The amount of knowledge Gained about Russia over the course of the term has been astounding
